desc: Mala beads and yoga inspired jewellery handmade in Australia with the high quality metals, gemstones, sandalwood and rudraksha. Emma from Ava Jewels can host your event including jewellery making workshops, womens circles, meditation classes, hens parties and blessings ways in Brisbane, Gold Coast and Byron Bay.

layout.text: Join me at The Craft Parlour to create your own intentional mala beads.
